Package io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog

Contains dialog classes for the StockMarket program.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDefaultDialog
    An default design of a dialog for this program.
    BuyDialog
    A dialog for the buy stock transaction.
    DialogFactory
    Factory class for creating dialogs in the program.
    ExceptionDialog
    A standard dialog generated when an exception occurs during the program.
    OpenPortfolioDialog  
    PortfolioNameDialog
    A dialog to set the name of the portfolio.
    SellDialog
    A dialog for performing a sell shares transaction.
    TransactionDialog
    An extension of the AbstractDefaultDialog framework.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Dialog
    Constant values for which dialog is currently being displayed.

Package io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog Description

Contains dialog classes for the StockMarket program. All classes follow a uniform API from AbstractDefaultDialog to ensure a consistent look and feel, and therefore they all extend that class.

AbstractDefaultDialog, meanwhile, extends AbstractListenerDialog from the MVP Framework. All dialogs conform to this framework for passing events to listening controllers.

Version:
2.0
Author:
craig
